step_data.thought:
Looking at the current page, I can see that I'm already on the 'New Cart Price Rule' page, which is part of the Marketing section's Promotions area. This is evident from the heading 'New Cart Price Rule' [683] and the URL path '/admin/sales_rule/promo_quote/new/'. 

Since I'm already on the page for setting up a new promotion (Cart Price Rule), there's no need to navigate further to access the Marketing section - I'm already in the right place to set up a new promotion.

I should inform the user that we've already reached the correct page for setting up a new promotion and they can proceed with filling out the form to create their new promotion rule.
step_data.action: stop('You are already on the page for setting up a new promotion. This is the "New Cart Price Rule" form under Marketing > Promotions where you can create your new promotion by filling out the required information such as Rule Name, Websites, Customer Groups, and other promotion details.')
